meanings.definition: A person who holds extreme conservative political views.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarightist always votes for the most conservative candidates.
meanings.sent2: The ultrarightist attended the political rally to support conservative policies.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarightist joked that they were so conservative, they thought even the tea party was too liberal.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of political ideologies, the ultrarightist stood firm on the far right shore.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ultrarightist was etched in the minds of all who attended the debate.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to extreme conservative political views.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarightist group organized a protest against the new tax law.
meanings.sent2: Her ultrarightist beliefs influenced her stance on social issues.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarightist fashion show featured suits in traditional conservative colors.
meanings.sent4: The ultrarightist rhetoric echoed through the halls of the political convention.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarightist banner waved proudly in the conservative stronghold.
